plain:
I can infer that the user likes movies that are:
- Dramatic (The Shawshank Redemption, Schindler's List, 12 Angry Men, Amadeus, The Bridge on the River Kwai, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Apocalypse Now, Psycho, American Beauty)
- Comedic (Monty Python's Life of Brian, The Wrong Trousers, Young Frankenstein)
- Animated (Babe, The Wrong Trousers, Toy Story 2)
- Science Fiction (Terminator Salvation)
- Horror (Psycho)
- Based on true stories (Schindler's List, The Bridge on the River Kwai, Amadeus, Maya Lin: A Strong Clear Vision)
- Based on books (The Shawshank Redemption, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Psycho, Amadeus, Young Frankenstein)
- Set in the past (The Bridge on the River Kwai, Amadeus, Young Frankenstein, King Kong)
- Set in the future (Terminator Salvation)
- Set in the present (The Shawshank Redemption, 12 Angry Men, American Beauty)
- Set in a fictional world (Babe, Toy Story 2)
- With a runtime of 2 hours or more (The Shawshank Redemption, Schindler's List, 12 Angry Men, Amadeus, The Bridge on the River Kwai, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Apocalypse Now, Psycho, American Beauty)
- With a runtime of less than 2 hours (Babe, Monty Python's Life of Brian, The Wrong Trousers, Young Frankenstein, Terminator Salvation, Toy Story 2)
- With a runtime of exactly 2 hours (Dr. Strangelove, Maya Lin: A Strong Clear Vision, The Thin Man Goes Home)

I can also infer that the user likes movies that are:
- Rated PG or PG-13 (Babe, Toy Story 2)
- Rated R (The Shawshank Redemption, Schindler's List, 12 Angry Men, Amadeus, The Bridge on the River Kwai, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Apocalypse Now, Psycho, American Beauty, Terminator Salvation)
- Rated NC-17 (Dr. Strangelove, Maya Lin: A Strong Clear Vision, The Thin Man Goes Home)
